abstract: Microsoft has no plans to raise its bid for Yahoo, according to reports Tuesday that cited anonymous sources. Some analysts have speculated that Microsoft might increase its offer, which Yahoo has said “substantially undervalues” the company.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft has no plans to raise its bid for Yahoo, according to reports Tuesday that cited anonymous sources. Some analysts have speculated that Microsoft might increase its offer, which Yahoo has said “substantially undervalues” the company.

headline.main: Microsoft Said to Stand Firm on Yahoo Bid
